message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we settle on $87? That's a significant discount from my initial offer.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
